title: Amend Other Deductions
description: This endpoint allows the developer to amend deductions. A National Insurance number and tax year must be provided.

customerReference.description: A reference the user supplies to identify the record.

amountDeducted.description:
Deduction from Seafarers' Earnings.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nameOfShip.description: The name of the ship worked on.

fromDate.description: The date work started in the format YYYY-MM-DD

toDate.description: The date work ended in format YYYY-MM-DD
